alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 11:26AM MST until December 15 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches, mainly along the foothills of the Sangre de Cristo Mountains and around Clines Corners. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Estancia Valley, Espanola Valley, Santa Fe Metro Area, and Upper Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40, especially between Edgewood, Moriarty, and Clines Corners. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Rio Grande Valley
